section.p: The Mental Status Organizer template may be used to group related Mental Status Observations (e.g., results of mental tests) and associated Assessment Scale Observations into subcategories and/or groupings by time. Subcategories can be things such as Mood and Affect, Behavior, Thought Process, Perception, Cognition, etc.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-14375, CONF:1198-14376, CONF:1198-32566 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.75"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Cognitive Status Result Organizer template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.75)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-14378)
The code selected indicates the category that groups the contained mental status observations (e.g., communication, learning and applying knowledge).

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1198-32424)
The effectiveTime is an interval that spans the effectiveTimes of the contained mental status observations. Because all contained mental status observations have a required time stamp, it is not required that this effectiveTime be populated.

SHALL contain [1..*] component such that it (CONF:1198-14373, CONF:1198-14381)
Conforms to Mental Status Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.74:2015-08-01)
code/@code SHOULD be selected from ICF (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.254) OR LOINC (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) (CONF:1198-14698)
The Organizer SHALL have at least one of code or effectiveTime (CONF:1198-32425, CONF:1198-32426)
SHALL conform to Result Organizer template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.1)
SHALL conform to Cognitive Status Result Organizer template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.75)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="CLUSTER" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:14369, R2.1=CONF:1198-14369)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:14371, R2.1=CONF:1198-14371)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:14377, R2.1=CONF:1198-14377)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-14378)
The code selected indicates the category that groups the contained mental status observations (e.g., communication, learning and applying knowledge).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:14372, R2.1=CONF:1198-14372, R2.1=CONF:1198-19093)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1198-32424)
The effectiveTime is an interval that spans the effectiveTimes of the contained mental status observations. Because all contained mental status observations have a required time stamp, it is not required that this effectiveTime be populated.

SHALL contain [1..*] component such that it (CONF:1198-14373, CONF:1198-14381)
Conforms to Mental Status Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.74:2015-08-01)

The value for 'code' in a result organizer SHOULD be selected from LOINC (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) and MAY be selected from CPT-4 (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.12). Laboratory results SHOULD be from LOINC (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or other constrained terminology named by the US Department of Health and Human Services Office of National Coordinator or other federal agency. Local and/or regional codes for laboratory results SHOULD also be allowed. (CONF:7164)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="CLUSTER" Cluster (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) OR SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="BATTERY" Battery (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7165)
code SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @code should be selected from ICF (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.254) or SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) (CONF:14697, CONF:14698)
code/@code SHOULD be selected from ICF (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.254) OR LOINC (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) (CONF:1198-14698)
The Organizer SHALL have at least one of code or effectiveTime (CONF:1198-32425, CONF:1198-32426)

body.codeblock: <organizer xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="CLUSTER" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.75" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.1"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.75"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1573756953"/> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <component> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.74" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.2"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.74"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.74" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.2"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.74"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.74" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.2"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.74"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="2104697760"/> <code code="373930000" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT" displayName="Cognitive function finding"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <author> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119"/> <time/> <assignedAuthor/> </author> <author/> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.69"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.69"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1379070883"/> <code code="683918464"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <author/> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.86"/> <statusCode code="completed"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <referenceRange/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <supply classCode="SPLY"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.50"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="90488761"/> <code code="1151580166"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime value="20170828"/> </supply> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.72"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="140277218"/> <code code="149026522"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <participant typeCode="IND"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <referenceRange> <observationRange/> </referenceRange> </observation> </component> </organizer>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:14375, CONF:14376 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.75"

Consol Cognitive Status Result Organizer code SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @code should be selected from ICF (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.254) or SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) (CONF:14697, CONF:14698)
SHALL conform to Result Organizer template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.1)
Consol Cognitive Status Result Organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="CLUSTER" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:14369, R2.1=CONF:1198-14369)
Consol Cognitive Status Result Organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:14371, R2.1=CONF:1198-14371)
Consol Cognitive Status Result Organizer SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:14377, R2.1=CONF:1198-14377)
Consol Cognitive Status Result Organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:14378)

Consol Cognitive Status Result Organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:14372, R2.1=CONF:1198-14372, R2.1=CONF:1198-19093)

Consol Cognitive Status Result Organizer SHALL contain [1..*] component such that it (CONF:14373, CONF:14381) Conforms to Cognitive Status Result Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.74)
